entry.title: Warner Brothers Taps Nifty’s, Daz 3D to Launch Game of Thrones NFTs
entry.summary: The American media giant is rolling out digital collectibles, including iconic moments and characters, from the hit series Game of Thrones.

entry.title: Bored Apes Otherside Builder: Web3 ‘Only Plausible Solution’ to Manage Metaverse Economy
entry.summary: Improbable CEO Herman Narula argued that Web3 solutions are “the only means to efficiently share value in the metaverse.”

entry.title: OpenSea Now Auto-Detects and Blocks Stolen NFTs, Disables Scam Links
entry.summary: Leading NFT marketplace OpenSea unveiled new automated features to prevent scams and stop the resale of swiped assets.

entry.title: CZ Suggests Binance Pay as ‘Solution’ for Crypto Payments on Twitter
entry.summary: After Musk’s Twitter takeover, Binance CEO Changpeng Zhao said that his company is “ready to help” with crypto and Web3 on the platform.

entry.title: Third Time’s a Charm? Bitcoin Miner Bitdeer Delays $4B SPAC Deal Again
entry.summary: Bitcoin miner Bitdeer is again delaying its multi-billion dollar SPAC deal as crypto winter continues to grip the industry.

entry.title: Celsius Creditors' Lawyer 'Looking Into' Whether Firm Was a Ponzi Scheme: Report
entry.summary: The bankrupt crypto lender Celsius is under more scrutiny over fresh allegations of running a Ponzi scheme.

entry.title: Musk’s Twitter Reforms Could ‘Damage The Blue Check's Anti-Scam Role’: Ethereum Founder Vitalik Buterin
entry.summary: Vitalik Buterin joined high-profile critics of Musk’s proposals, highlighting the importance of due diligence in the verification process.

entry.title: Crypto Exchange Deribit Hacked for $28M in Bitcoin, Ethereum, USDC
entry.summary: Panama-based crypto exchange Deribit halted withdrawals after hackers made off with $28 million in Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Circle's USDC.

entry.title: Report Claims 97% of Uniswap Tokens Are ‘Rug Pulls’—Crypto Twitter Has Doubts
entry.summary: The researchers found that "90% of tokens using locking contracts tend to become a rug pull or a malicious token eventually."

entry.title: Binance CEO: Crypto Is the 'Only Stable Thing' Amid Financial Turmoil
entry.summary: Binance CEO Changpeng Zhao took to the stage at Web Summit to discuss regulators, the crypto crash, and Elon Musk's unpredictability.

entry.title: 'Rick & Morty' Creator’s Art Gobblers Renew Debate Over NFT Influencer Ethics
entry.summary: The buzzy launch upset many collectors, who allege that influencers hyped it in exchange for free NFTs now trading for nearly $23,000.

entry.title: Bitcoin Holds Above $20K Ahead of Fed’s Interest Rate Decision
entry.summary: The Fed will reveal tomorrow if it will continue to hike interest rates. Tuesday data suggests it might, but Bitcoin hasn't budged.

entry.title: Aave's Stani Kulechov: What Sets Our GHO Stablecoin Apart
entry.summary: Layer 2s like Optimism and Arbitrum will "radically decrease the cost of actually transacting and using blockchain-based security," Kulechov said.

entry.title: Coinbase Is Backing Ripple Against the SEC
entry.summary: America's largest crypto exchange is getting more and more vocal with its support for industry peers engaged in legal battles with the SEC.

entry.title: Stepn’s New Solana, Ethereum NFT Marketplace Bucks Anti-Royalties Trend
entry.summary: Will traders pay $30 per month to buy and sell NFTs—and not just digital sneakers—on the move-to-earn game’s marketplace?

entry.title: Dogecoin Jumps 29% as Musk-Fueled Meme Rally Continues
entry.summary: The coin behind the dog ralled double-digits after Musk posted a picture of his Shiba Inu donning the Twitter logo.

entry.title: Open Metaverse Alliance Says It Won’t Let Meta Define the Future of the Internet
entry.summary: With Dapper Labs and The Sandbox among its ranks, OMA3 opens up membership amid push for an interoperable Web3 world.

entry.title: Now Anyone Can Create an Ethereum NFT DAO With Zora’s Nouns Builder
entry.summary: Zora’s new no-code tool makes it easier to create a DAO funded by NFT auctions, following the model established by hit project Nouns.

entry.title: El Salvador Development Bank Refuses to Reveal Bitcoin Records
entry.summary: A Salvadoran legal aid agency said that the government has twice denied its request for information.

entry.title: SEC’s Hester Peirce Says Agency's Current Approach Is 'Not a Good Way of Regulating'
entry.summary: The Commissioner told Decrypt that the SEC is not working in good faith on crypto regulation, and could get left behind.

entry.title: GameStop Adds Web3 Gaming NFTs to Marketplace With Immutable X
entry.summary: Interactive NFTs from games like Gods Unchained and Illuvium are now available through the video game retailer’s Web3 platform.

entry.title: Apollo Global to Hold Crypto for Institutional Clients Through Anchorage Partnership
entry.summary: The private equity giant that manages half a trillion dollars will use Anchorage for institutional crypto custody.

entry.title: Andreessen Horowitz ‘Temporarily’ Helping Elon Musk With Twitter
entry.summary: Binance isn’t the only pro-crypto company helping Musk improve Twitter—VC goliath a16z has joined the flock.

entry.title: Hong Kong To Conduct Public Consultation on Retail Crypto Trading, ETFs
entry.summary: The Chinese territory is considering a range of pro-crypto measures, in contrast to the mainland’s draconian approach to digital asset regulation.

entry.title: Binance CEO: We Put $500M into Elon Musk's Acquisition 'To Bring Twitter Into Web3'
entry.summary: Binance CEO Changpeng Zhao believes crypto needs a “seat at the table” following Elon Musk’s takeover of Twitter.

entry.title: Dogecoin Doubles in October, Following Elon Musk's Twitter Takeover
entry.summary: Following Elon Musk's Twitter takeover, Dogecoin is on a speculative tear—though any plans for Twitter to use the meme coin have yet to be revealed.

entry.title: Chain Follows NFL Patriots Deal With Miami Heat Web3 Partnership
entry.summary: The FTX-sponsored Heat have teamed up with Chain as the team's "official Web3 and blockchain infrastructure partner."

entry.title: Crypto Lender Hodlnaut Lost Almost $190 Million in Terra Crash: Report
entry.summary: A judicial report alleged that the crypto lender’s directors ‘downplayed’ the extent of its exposure to the Terra ecosystem.

entry.title: Neobank Unicorn Revolut, 1inch Launch ‘Learn & Earn’ DeFi Course
entry.summary: The crypto-friendly bank Revolut is teaming up with 1inch Network to educate its users on the world of decentralized exchanges and DeFi.

entry.title: Bitcoin Miner Argo Blockchain Shares Plunge 40% as $27M Raise Called Off
entry.summary: Argo Blockchain has revealed that a planned $27 million raise will not go ahead, sending its share price plummeting.

entry.title: Terra Co-Founder Do Kwon Faces $57M Class-Action Lawsuit in Singapore
entry.summary: The Supreme Court of Singapore will this week hold a hearing on a class-action lawsuit filed against Terraform Labs CEO Do Kwon.

entry.title: Ethereum Founder Vitalik Buterin: Crypto Industry Shouldn't Be 'Enthusiastically Pursuing Institutional Capital'
entry.summary: The co-founder of the world’s second largest cryptocurrency weighed in on regulations that could change the course of crypto.

entry.title: Elon Musk, Twitter, Dogecoin, Bluesky, and the Decentralized Social Media Race
entry.summary: Dogecoin lover Elon Musk owns Twitter, Kanye West owns crypto-friendly Parler, and Bitcoin maxi Jack Dorsey is backing Bluesky. Here we go!

entry.title: Dogecoin Leaps 94% in Weekly Gains Following Elon Musk’s Twitter Acquisition
entry.summary: Dodging the chill of crypto winter, the memecoin rallied to its highest price in five months.

entry.title: What Are Nouns? The Ethereum NFT DAO Building Open-Source IP
entry.summary: These pixel art NFTs drop at a rate of one per day, and have built a decentralized brand worth millions of dollars.

entry.title: Visa, PayPal, Western Union Among Fall Flurry of Crypto Trademark Filings
entry.summary: There have been three times as many NFT trademark applications filed so far this year in the U.S. than in all of 2021.

entry.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: Musk Takeover, Twitter Crypto Wallet in the Works
entry.summary: Binance’s Changpeng Zhao and MicroStrategy’s Michael Saylor welcomed Twitter’s new boss.

entry.title: This Week in Coins: Bitcoin and Ethereum See Green Shoots, Dogecoin Gets Musk Twitter Bump
entry.summary: After a long streak of flat weeks, crypto markets appeared to unfreeze. Block-owned Cash App also expanded its crypto features.

entry.title: Crypto.com Trading Volume Sinks 91% One Year After 'Brave' Matt Damon Ad
entry.summary: Bad ad or bad timing? Either way, trading is down big.

entry.title: MakerDAO Splits in Two Over Founder’s 'Endgame' Proposal
entry.summary: Opposing factions are forming within MakerDAO over founder Rune Christensen's controversial proposal.

entry.title: In the Alien Worlds Metaverse Game, DAOs Are Game Pieces
entry.summary: Stacy Neale of Dacoco, producer of Alien Worlds, tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson at NFT Expoverse 2022 how Alien Worlds has a "DAO ecosystem" inside its game, and says it's "more than a game, more than DAOs, more than a metaverse."

entry.title: gm: Meet the Bored Apes
entry.summary: Bored Ape Yacht Club co-founders Wylie Aronow ("Gordon Goner") and Greg Solano ("Garga") joined Dan Roberts and Kate Irwin on the gm podcast to talk about BAYC parent company Yuga Labs and its size and influence in the space, Ape haters, NFT haters, the SEC investigating Yuga, Buzzfeed "doxxing" Aronow and Solano earlier this year, their vision for the Otherside metaverse realm, and much more. Watch Episode 21 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.

entry.title: Cryptex Is Launching a Token That Tracks the Overall NFT Market Cap
entry.summary: Cryptex CEO Joe Sticco joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about how Cryptex is working with Chainlink and Coinbase Cloud to launch a token that tracks the performance of the entire NFT market and why such an asset might bring new people into NFTs and make the market more accessible.

entry.title: Joe Lubin: How the Ethereum Merge Went, Why ETH Is Down, NFTs, Metaverse, and the 'Killer App'
entry.summary: Ethereum co-founder and ConsenSys CEO Joe Lubin joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts on October 4 for a deep-dive chat on the Ethereum merge and aftermath, what's keeping the crypto market down, why he's super bullish on NFTs and the metaverse, whether it's really a multichain future, and much more.

entry.title: gm: All Things Solana With Anatoly Yakovenko
entry.summary: Solana has had a year of amazing growth—but also multiple network outages. Co-founder Anatoly Yakovenko joined Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott on the gm podcast to talk about the outages, what's next for Solana at its upcoming Breakpoint event, how it competes with Ethereum, how long he expects the bear market to last, what's happening with NFTs on Solana, and much more. Watch Episode 20 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.

entry.title: Decrypt-O's Ep. 3: Where Is Do Kwon?
entry.summary: In this episode of Decrypt-Os, Sander Lutz is back on the street to search for Terra co-founder Do Kwon after Interpol issued a "red notice." His search takes him to the home of a former CIA agent for guidance, and to the place where everyone missing goes to hide out: the mall.

entry.title: The DeFi Governance Conundrum: Synthetix Founder Kain Warwick at SmartCon 2022
entry.summary: Synthetix founder Kain Warwick spoke with Decrypt's Dan Roberts all about DeFi governance and its challenges, his problems with voting platforms like Snapshot, DAO fatigue, regulation and the SEC, and stablecoins onstage at Chainlink SmartCon 2022.

entry.title: How Web3 Data Storage Startup Space and Time Scored Microsoft Investment
entry.summary: Space and Time CEO Nate Holiday joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about Space and Time's data storage business, how it got investment from Microsoft, and why crypto-native businesses are looking for alternatives to big centralized cloud providers.

entry.title: Framework Ventures Co-Founder: 3 Paths for DeFi Investment Right Now
entry.summary: Framework Ventures co-founder Vance Spencer joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about the three paths for DeFi, why crypto VCs are all talking about NFTs and gaming right now, and whether crypto startups should be concerned about regulation.

entry.title: Compound Founder: Stablecoins Have 'Crazy Traction' and Do What Bitcoin Was Expected to Do
entry.summary: Compound founder Robert Leshner joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about the shift Compound has seen in borrowing demands and how it has adjusted accordingly, why he believes stablecoins "will win and conquer everything," and how regulators are approaching the space.

entry.title: Coin Metrics CEO: TradFi Firms Getting Into Crypto Care Most About Mitigating Their Risk
entry.summary: Coin Metrics CEO Tim Rice joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about the blockchain data Coin Metrics gathers, who its customers are, how studying blockchain data can cut down on risk and exposure, and the priorities and concerns of traditional firms that are dipping a toe into crypto.

entry.title: Why Superchief Gallery 'Leaned In Really Hard Really Early' to Displaying NFTs
entry.summary: Superchief Gallery co-founder Ed Zipco joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about Superchief's IRL NFT gallery in L.A., how the gallery updated its tech in 2016 to thin displays to show digital art, and why Zipco believes Superchief "shows digital work the way you'd want to live with it or see it in a museum—not on a phone, not on a laptop."

entry.title: How Armanino Performs Proof of Reserves: Clayton Lowery at SmartCon 2022
entry.summary: Clayton Lowery of Armanino LLP joins Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about how Armanino conducts its "proof of reserves" audits of crypto lenders like Nexo, how to foresee the next crypto company meltdown, trust in Tether, and scrutiny of stablecoins.

entry.title: OKX's Chengcai Li: 'Theres a Lot of Work to Do' Because Much of Web3 Is Still Powered by Web2
entry.summary: Chengcai Li, head of business development at OKX, joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about OKCoin's rebrand to OKX, dealing with different regulations in different countries, and how centralized exchanges can lead Web3 into its next era.
